title: Ketu Transit in the 6th House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting the 6th house for Taurus Ascendant brings detachment from daily conflicts, competition, and routine struggles. Motivation to engage in power battles or prove superiority reduces, shifting focus toward quiet efficiency. Health awareness increases, especially regarding chronic or subtle issues, requiring mindful routines. Workplace involvement becomes selective, sometimes creating perceptions of withdrawal. When handled consciously, Ketu refines service-oriented work, sharpens problem resolution without ego, and supports recovery through disciplined simplicity.
closing: Ketu in the 6th house dissolves attachment to conflict and struggle. Conscious discipline turns detachment into efficient service and steady healing.
